title: Escape from Tenopia 2 Sea Kingdom-Choose Your Own Adventure.pdf
description:
Escape From Tenopia #2 Trapped in the Sea Kingdom
by Richard Brightfield,
Illustrated by David Perry
Series created by Edward Packard

This is, pretty much, a Choose Your Own Adventure book.  The big difference, is that while there are many paths/choices you can make, there is only one ending (The End), and you have to make all the right choices to get to it.

I am an avid collector of the classic Choose Your Own Adventure books (and spin-offs, like Tenopia).  This is the hardest/rarest book for me to find; I tried searching Google, with no real luck... I had been combing through eBay without luck, too.  I think I finally found this one on Amazon, and even so, it's a retired library book.

I had to shorten the filename to make it fit 64 characters on tpb, thus it's named "Sea Kingdom" instead of "Trapped in the Sea Kingdom"

Here are other books in the Escape From Tenopia series:
#1 Tenopia Island by Edward Packard
#2 Trapped in the Sea Kingdom by Richard Brightfield
#3 Terror on Kabran by Richard Brightfield
#4 Star System Tenopia by Richard Brigtfield

Enjoy
